sim-config-description:
This simulator is designed to simulate real dice rolls based on attack profiles. Given that it is simulating rolls and not running statistical algorithms, the accuracy of the result increases with the number of iterations run.

When a points cost is set for each unit the simulator will automatically multiply the attacks of units so that an equal point value comparison is used for the output. If you do not wish for attacks to be normalized. Do not set points values.

Some buff fields, damage and attacks accept standard dice notation. ("d3","3","2d3", etc). All other fields do not.
sim-config-disclaimer:
This tool is not perfect by any stretch. It isn't capable of simulating every possible attack profile in the game, and its output does not reflect every potential target.

The simulation tool itself is copyright © Relic Wargraming. All IP related to Age of Sigmar is copyright Game Workshop, Relic Wargaming makes no claim to its ownership. All rights reserved.
average-graph-sub-title: The combined average damage output for all iterations.
whiff-graph-sub-title: How often the unit does zero damage.
reliabiliy-graph-sub-title: How often the unit deals average damage or better.
histogram-sub-title: Visual representation of the distribution of damage.
buff-reroll-description: Note: The simulator only uses the first re-roll effect that it finds for a given roll level
